column5: I was just about to buy it and I thought it was $19.99.  Now it's at $35.  Am I mistaken?  Does it go on sale often or was it always $35?  Thanks in advance  Mark
I got it for 9.95 last year 35.00 WOW that's a lot
I just checked my iTunes store receipt from Jan. 7/11. $29.99 + HST = 33.89. I know that the price is different/lower for both the iPhone & iPod.

I looked it up when the app was first mentioned here. It was t the higher price even then. The phone etc are cheaper for some reason. I didn't rush to get it although I probably will once the warm weather is back. it looks pretty nifty. The iPad won't be going on the water though.  JF
It was $19.99 when I bought it.  I guess they realized they could charge more.  Still pretty good value.
Can't say much about iPad, but I know it's $14.99 on the iPhone.  Worth every penny imo
